name: MedValue
description:
MedValue is a leading provider of Business Process Outsourcing services. We work for customers in the Healthcare industry and support Physician Groups, Managed Care companies, Medicaid MCOs, Third Party Administrators, MSOs and Medical Billing companies by reducing their costs and improving efficiencies within their organizations.
We are a U.S. based company headquartered in Chicago with HIPAA-compliant operations in India.
We combine the expertise of our U.S. based Management Team and the talents of our staff in the U.S. and Offshore to collaborate with our customers.
We aim to improve your effectiveness through a unique blend of technology and highly qualified resources from our company.
